funnyHacks.title: Ellen’s Cupcake Recipe Hack
funnyHacks.description: UK intelligence hacked an online jihadist bomb-making site and replaced the bomb recipe with Ellen DeGeneres’s mojito cupcake recipe. Sweet and harmless!

funnyHacks.title: Printer Botnet Warning
funnyHacks.description: A hacker named Stackoverflowin took control of 150,000 unsecured printers and printed a funny warning message: 'YOUR PRINTER HAS BEEN OWNED.'

funnyHacks.title: Thunderstruck Power Plant
funnyHacks.description: During the Stuxnet cyberattack on Iranian nuclear centrifuges, AC/DC’s 'Thunderstruck' song blared randomly, adding a rock concert vibe to a cyberwarfare operation.

funnyHacks.title: Novice Hacker Kid
funnyHacks.description: An 11-year-old boy in India hacked his father’s email and tried to blackmail him for 10 million rupees after learning hacking tricks on YouTube.
